Author: Taurenkey (Puni.sh)
Name: Pandora's Box
Punchline: Do you dare to open Pandora's Box?
Description:
Pandora's Box is a collection of major QoL tweaks and adjustments.

Open the box with /pandora
ChangeLog:
- Bug fixes for multiple features, including Auto-Tank stance, Reduce All, Repair All, Party Finder View More and Quick Lower Quality.
- IPC were broken? Probably fixed now.
